verses.roman:
ei-mata cali' cali' kaṭaka āilā
sākṣi-gopāla dekhi' sabe se dina rahilā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; cali' cali'-walking and walking; kaṭaka āilā—they reached the town known as Kaṭaka; sākṣi-gopāla dekhi'-after seeing the Deity known as Sākṣi-gopāla; sabe—all the devotees; se dina—that day; rahilā—stayed.
translation: Walking and walking in this way, the devotees arrived at the city of Kaṭaka, where they remained for a day and saw the temple of Sākṣi-gopāla.
